meanings.definition: A monetary unit of India, Pakistan, and Nepal, equal to one hundredth of a rupee.
meanings.sent1: I found a paisa on the street.
meanings.sent2: She saved every paisa she earned.
meanings.sent3: The paisa rolled away like a tiny wheel.
meanings.sent4: In her eyes, every paisa was a shining star.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the paisa dropping echoed in the room.

meanings.sent1: He didn't have a paisa to spare.
meanings.sent2: She gave him a paisa for good luck.
meanings.sent3: The paisa seemed to dance in his hand.
meanings.sent4: Her generosity was worth more than any paisa.
meanings.sent5: The paisa slipped through his fingers like sand.
